body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons           The mounds can be observed any time of year. They are even visible when covered in snow. NPS Photo       The visitor center is open year round except for Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, New Year's Day, and during extreme weather conditions. Visitor center hours vary by season; check below for specific operating hours. Trails are open 365 days a year from dawn until dusk.   Spring  First Sunday in April to Memorial Day  8:00am –4:30pm    Summer  Memorial Day to Labor Day  8:00am –6:00pm    Fall  Labor Day to Mid-October  8:00am –5:00pm    Winter  Mid-October to first Sunday in April  8:30am –4:30pm
